participant_1.background:
I enjoy hiking because it allows me to connect with nature and my spiritual side.
I hope my parents don't find out about my deployment.
I miss my grandchildren when they're not around, but I'm so happy to have them in my life.
i love my grandchildren.
i love robotics.

participant_2.background:
I've been having trouble focusing on my schoolwork because I'm so caught up in my daydreams.
I enjoy the peace and quiet of the woods when I go hiking on the weekends.
my ultimate dream , however , is to be a writer.
My parents were always busy with work, so I had to get a job early to help make ends meet.
i am a gymnast.

content.text: Hi there! I hope you are having a great day!
Hi! Thank you, I hope you are as well.
That's good to hear! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking and spend time in nature. I also love robotics.
Those sound like fun hobbies! I like to go hiking too, but I haven't had a chance to do it lately. I also love to read and write.
What kind of things do you like to read?
I like to read all sorts of things, but I mostly read fiction. I love getting lost in a good book.
I love getting lost in a good book too!
What are some of your favorite books?
I'm a big fan of the Harry Potter series. I also love the Lord of the Rings series.
Those are both great series! I've read them both multiple times.
Me too! I'm also a big fan of the Hunger Games series.
I've heard good things about that series, but I haven't read it yet.
You should! It's a really good series.
I'll have to check it out.
